main:
Every turn, the following happens as long as Faust isn't disabled (staggered, paniced, corroded, etc):
{status:IndexPrescriptTargetToEnemy} is assigned to a random enemy, increasing damage taken from Index identities.
{status:IndexPrescriptTargetMarkToEnemy} is assigned to a random skill (1 per slot, 2 skills max, prioritizes S3 at 6+ {status:BlessingOfIndexPrescriptAlly}).
Gain a {status:IndexPrescript_Base}

The {status:IndexPrescript_Base} gained depends on her {status:BlessingOfIndexPrescriptAlly}.
0-2: {status:IndexPrescriptFaust_0} (use a marked skill)
3-5: {status:IndexPrescriptFaust_1} (hit a target with a marked skill)
6-8: {status:IndexPrescriptFaust_2} (hit a target with an ego awakening or a marked S3)
9+: {status:IndexPrescriptFaust_3} (no condition)
Following the Prescript gives her SP and {status:BlessingOfIndexPrescriptAlly}, more if her target had {status:IndexPrescriptTargetToEnemy}. Failure to follow the {status:IndexPrescript_Base} will give her {status:KarmaOfIndexAlly} instead.
other: Her skills are pretty straightforward, just follow the {status:IndexPrescript_Base} and save her S3 for when she reaches 6-8 {status:BlessingOfIndexPrescriptAlly}.
Her passive increases her damage and status application when she follows the {status:IndexPrescriptTargetToEnemy} and {status:IndexPrescriptTargetMarkToEnemy} mechanics.

1021401.desc:
Deal +2% damage with Skills marked with [IndexPrescriptTargetMarkToEnemy] for every [BlessingOfIndexPrescriptAlly] on self (max 16%)
- At 9 [BlessingOfIndexPrescriptAlly], deal +20% damage with Base Skills instead

On Hit with a Base Skill against target with [IndexPrescriptTargetToEnemy], gain 1 [Breath] and inflict 1 [Sinking] (once per turn)
- Increase the number of times this effect can trigger per turn by 1 for every 3 [BlessingOfIndexPrescriptAlly] (max 2)

- At 9 [BlessingOfIndexPrescriptAlly], Base Skills inflict +1 more [Sinking] Potency and this unit gains +1 more [Breath] Potency
1021401.name: Proselyte's Blade

1021402.desc:
Turn Start:
- Gain [IndexPrescriptFaust_0] / [IndexPrescriptFaust_1] / [IndexPrescriptFaust_2] / [IndexPrescriptFaust_3] based on [BlessingOfIndexPrescriptAlly] on self
- Inflict [IndexPrescriptTargetToEnemy] to a random enemy (in Focused Encounters, the Part)
- Apply [IndexPrescriptTargetMarkToEnemy] to Base Attack Skills on this unit's Dashboard (1 per Slot, max 2 Skills)
Â· At 6+ [BlessingOfIndexPrescriptAlly], the effect above prioritizes Skill 3
- All of the effects above and [IndexPrescript_Base] execution checks do not trigger when this unit is Staggered, Immobilized[TabExplain], in Panic, or in E.G.O Corrosion[TabExplain]
1021402.name: Prescript Delivered on Paper Slips

1021403.desc:
Turn End: If [IndexPrescript_Base] was executed this turn, heal 4 SP and gain 1 [BlessingOfIndexPrescriptAlly] (once per turn)
- When executing [IndexPrescript_Base], if the main target has [IndexPrescriptTargetToEnemy], heal 8 SP and gain 3 [BlessingOfIndexPrescriptAlly] instead

Turn End: If [IndexPrescript_Base] was not executed this turn, gain 5 [KarmaOfIndexAlly]
- At 9 [BlessingOfIndexPrescriptAlly], does not gain [KarmaOfIndexAlly]
- If this unit attempted to execute [IndexPrescript_Base] at Combat Start, but could not target the enemy during the combat phase, does not gain [KarmaOfIndexAlly]
1021403.name: Will of the Prescript

1021421.desc:
Effects apply to the Identity with the earliest Deployment order
- Prioritizes The Index Identities

Combat Start: If this unit's leftmost Skill on the Dashboard and other allies target the same enemy Slot, said Skill deals +5% damage for every ally targeting the same Slot excluding this unit (max 15%, applies when this unit and allies both use Base Attack Skills to main-target enemy Slot)
1021421.name: As the Prescript Orders...

data.desc:
Final Power +1 for every 3 [BlessingOfIndexPrescriptAlly] (max 3)
[StartBattle] Gain Shield equal to 10% of max HP (once per turn)
- Reduce Shield gained by 1% for every 5 [KarmaOfIndexAlly]; at 50+ [KarmaOfIndexAlly], does not gain Shield
[WhenUse] Gain 2 [Breath]
data.name: Prescript-granted, Prescript-woven Fabric

data.desc:

[StartBattle] Gain Shield equal to 15% of max HP (once per turn)
- Reduce Shield gained by 1.5% for every 5 [KarmaOfIndexAlly]; at 50+ [KarmaOfIndexAlly], does not gain Shield
[WhenUse] Gain 2 [Breath]
data.name: Prescript-granted, Prescript-woven Fabric
